item.description:
PHOTOGRAPHICA ?08. The 69th Show and Sale sponsored by the Photographic Historical Society of New England, Inc., conveniently located at the Americal Civic Center, 467 Main Street., Wakefield, MA. Over 70 tables.
Dealers from throughout the U.S., Europe, and Asia.

Cameras/images, modern, antique, collectible, everything photographic. Cameras from Agfa to Zeiss.
Dealers will be buying cameras from the public. Open Sat., May 3, 9 a.m. to 5 p.m.; Sun., May 4, 10 a.m. to 4 pm. Early Bird (7:00 A.M.) Admission $30.00 - General Admission: $5; PHSNE Members $3; Seniors and Students $4.

http://www.phsne.org/...

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Photographica Cameras and Images- Sale and SHow
